title: Getting a Handle On Godly Discipline
itunes:author: Featured Guest: Dr. David Clarke
itunes:summary:
There's so much conflicting advice on the internet about correcting your child's misbehavior – but what does the Bible teach about godly discipline? John and Danny offer practical, Bible-based advice.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.
